Literature.Title: Synthetic Cyclolipopeptides Selective against Microbial, Plant and Animal Cell Targets by Incorporation of D-Amino Acids or Histidine.
Literature.Author: Vila S, Badosa E, Montesinos E, Planas M, Feliu L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=25-50µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=25-50µM),Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=>50µM),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici ATCC 201829(MIC=12.5-25µM)
